item.description:
The Beach Party is on for Saturday night after 9:09pm! The Band will kick things off at 9:09pm. Laurie's Special Beach Party Menu for this night begins at 9:09pm. If any guests want to dine earlier please make a reservation as they will be busy with their regular Saturday dinner crowd. Remember your beach wear.

 

Laurie's has changed the start of the 2013 Beach party to after 9:00pm in order to not interfear with the Saturday night dinner crowd. Please update your RSVP if this changes your plans. Dinner reservations are still being accepted. Late night menu will be avalable. Band starts at 9:00pm.

 

Bob, Laurie, Wayne, Paula and the rest of the crew at Laurie's 909 are sick of Winter and having a Beach Party with entertainment by the band, The Boys of Summer.

Please join the Red Sox Natives and other invited groups for a 2013 Beach Party at Laurie's 909 in Wakefield on Saturday, March 9 from 9:00pm to 1:00am.

Party starts at 9:00pm. The local band The Boys of Summer begin playing at 9:09pm with sets throughout the evening. Forget about Winter and dream of Summer with Palm Trees, Sand, Warm Weather Songs, Island Drink Specials (Wayne's 909 Punch and Mai Tais), Beach Bar Menu Specials (Cheeseburger in Paradise), Prizes for Best Individual and Group Beachwear Costume, Captain Morgan Promotion with Give-aways from the Ladies from Captain Morgan and more.

All guests are encouraged to wear beach attire and bring beach games (Twister, Beach Bingo...) for after dinner. Laurie's is looking for a Life Guard for the Evening! 

We will be gathering near both the Penny Lane and Trackside Bars at Laurie's.

There is no cover.

A BEACH PARTY IS ONLY AS FUN AS THE GUESTS WHO ATTEND! REMEMBER TO SPRING FORWARD OR TURN YOUR CLOCKS AHEAD AFTER THE PARTY AS SUNDAY WILL BE THE FIRST DAY OF DAYLIGHT SAVINGS TIME!

Arrive at or after 9:00pm as Laurie's will be packed with it's earlier dinner crowd.

Stay for appetizers, dinner, a cocktail or two or three, socializing and more. If you have a group of people that want a table reservation for dinner please call Laurie's at 781-246-1909 and make a reservation. For information on Laurie's 909 and the menu go to www.lauries909.com.

Get there when you can and stay as long as you are able. You are more than welcome to show up for all or just part of the event.

If this will be your first time meeting the Red Sox Natives and Wakefield Week Nights iCrew and the other groups check out the photos of those who RSVP Yes so you can find the group.

Please remember to maintain your own tab or pay as you order and tip your servers. However, if you sit at a group table a group bill may be provided so please communicate with your server when ordering. Credit Cards will be held by the servers at Laurie's.

Laurie's 909 Steakhouse and Raw Bar is Wakefield's newest restaurant and Bar with live entertainment several nights per week and Tuesday night Trivia with Morgan White Jr. from WBZ Radio. Laurie's is located at the Wakefield Commuter Rail Train Station in Wakefield. The Reading and Haverhill Commuter Rail trains stop at Laurie's. Laurie's is easily accessible within 10 minutes from Routes 128, 93, 28 and 1. Free parking is available in two lots on Tuttle Street, in the Church parking lot if there are no activities there, and on street after 5:00pm. Check out the MBTA or Hop Stop for additional public transit options including the less reliable/frequent 136 and 137 bus lines.

More information at http://www.lauries909.com

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Bob or the bartenders for the Wakefield, Red Sox and other groups in the bar area.
item.name: 2013 Beach Party (TIME CHANGE) with The Boys of Summer in Wakefield
